Index.title: About me
Index.desc:
I am a web developer with nearly 3 years of professional experience in web development.
My expertise includes advanced and modern web technologies such as Next.js, NestJS, React, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and TypeScript.
My main focus is on backend development, where I have worked on various projects using NestJS, Node.js, MySQL, and TypeORM.
I have extensive experience in both frontend and backend development, and as a developer, I am continuously learning and improving my skills.

My skills and experiences include:
- Frontend: Proficiency in Next.js and React for building dynamic and interactive user interfaces.
- Backend: Strong experience with NestJS and Node.js for creating efficient servers and APIs.
- Database: Familiarity with MySQL and using TypeORM for data management.
- Programming Languages: JavaScript and TypeScript for developing both client-side and server-side applications.
- Design and Styling: HTML and CSS for designing beautiful and responsive web pages.

I am always looking to learn new technologies and enhance my skills to provide the best solutions for complex challenges.
Index.powerWord: Coding is not just a job for me; it's a way to create a better and smarter world.
